verses.name: Mark 14:70
verses.text: And he denied it again. And a little after, they that stood by said again to Peter, Surely thou art one of them: for thou art a Galilean, and thy speech agreeth thereto.

verses.name: Mark 14:71
verses.text: But he began to curse and to swear, saying, I know not this man of whom ye speak.

verses.name: Mark 14:72
verses.text: And the second time the cock crew. And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him, Before the cock crow twice, thou shalt deny me thrice. And when he thought thereon, he wept.
